tool_description: Analyzes speed measurement variations to assess conveyor belt stability and identify irregular patterns.

speed_measurements.description: Array of speed measurements to analyze

target_speed.description: Target operational speed in meters per minute (1-1000)

error_messages: Insufficient data: speed_measurements must contain at least 3 measurements for meaningful analysis.
Invalid target speed: target_speed must be between 1 and 1000 meters per minute. Verify operational specifications.
Invalid tolerance: tolerance_percentage must be between 0.1 and 20 percent. Set realistic tolerance based on system requirements.
Invalid speed values: All speed measurements must be positive numbers. Check data quality and sensor calibration.
usage: Provide an array of speed measurements with target speed and tolerance. The tool analyzes variance patterns and stability metrics.

within_tolerance.description: Whether measurements are within specified tolerance

stability_score.description: Stability score from 0-100, higher indicates better stability
